description.zh: Coral 是由 Vox Media 开发的开源评论平台，旨在通过改进审核、评论展示和对话管理来提升在线讨论质量。它帮助出版商在网站上建立更安全、更智能且更具参与性的评论区。Coral 注重社区健康，支持自定义审核工作流和现有用户系统的集成。
description.en: Coral is an open-source commenting platform developed by Vox Media that aims to improve online discussions through better moderation, comment display, and conversation management. It enables publishers to host safer, smarter, and more engaging comment sections on their websites. Designed with community health in mind, Coral supports customizable workflows for comment moderation and integration with existing user systems.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 通过智能审核工具促进更健康的在线社区
- 提供简洁可定制的评论界面，提升用户参与度
- 让出版商完全掌控评论数据和社区规则

## 功能列表:

- 实时评论审核仪表板
- 灵活的评论流布局和展示选项
- 支持外部身份验证系统集成
- 垃圾评论和滥用行为检测工具
- 支持嵌套回复和富媒体评论
- 基于 Docker 的部署，便于安装和扩展
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Promotes healthier online communities through intelligent moderation tools
- Increases user engagement with a clean, customizable commenting interface
- Gives publishers full control over comment data and community policies

## Features:

- Real-time comment moderation dashboard
- Flexible comment stream layouts and display options
- Integration with external authentication systems
- Spam and abuse detection tools
- Support for nested replies and rich media comments
- Docker-based deployment for easy setup and scaling
